title: School-Museum Linked Situated Mathematics Learning Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Enhancing instructional design competencies by connecting school lessons and museum activities through smartphone-based VR simulations and situational interaction analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can identify three or more connections between school lessons and museum-based math activities through situational interaction analysis.
Learners can design open-ended resource exploration, unpredictable curiosity-inducing, and play-based engagement strategies in VR simulations.
Learners can develop one or more interactive implementation plans integrating classroom and museum learning when designing field studies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
